Description:
Detects Processes accessing the camera and microphone from suspicious folder

Author: Den Iuzvyk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Camera and Microphone Access
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((target_object like '%\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\capabilityaccessmanager\consentstore\%' and target_object like '%\nonpackaged%') and (target_object like '%microphone%' or target_object like '%webcam%') and (target_object like '%:#windows#temp#%' or target_object like '%:#$recycle.bin#%' or target_object like '%:#temp#%' or target_object like '%:#users#public#%' or target_object like '%:#users#default#%' or target_object like '%:#users#desktop#%'))
